name: Han Slate ( 汉 碑 )
description:
汉碑

一个长大了的孩子，在亲人的支持和帮助下，追求宇宙的真相。也许因为追求的是真理，所以最后得到了真理。

游戏只有两个语言供选择，逻辑简单。它只是讲了一个故事，仅此而已。

这个游戏是真实的，故事可能也是真实的，我是说不限于这个宇宙。

（2023年4月）

Han Slate

A grown-up child who, with the support and help of their loved ones, pursues the truth of the universe. Perhaps because they were seeking truth, they ultimately obtained it. 

The game only offers two language options and has a simple logic. It simply tells a small story, and that's all.

This game is real, and the story may also be real, not limited to this universe.

（2023.4）

____________________________________________

当前版本说明：

游戏在电脑网页上体验会更好一些，手机上的体验也还好。

Current version notes:

The game is best experienced on a computer web page, although the experience on a mobile device is also adequate.

____________________________________________

常见问题：

问：玩一遍游戏大概需要多长时间？

答：大概15-25分钟。

问：未来有什么计划？

答：根据进展再定计划。

____________________________________________

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: How long does it take to play the game?

A: It takes about 15-25 minutes.

Q: Are there any plans for the future?

A: Plans will be determined based on progress.

____________________________________________

Do We Live in a Simulation? Chances Are about 50–50
